text: Yevlakh is a small city in Azerbaijan. It is west of capital Baku. It is in the Yevlakh Rayon but is separate. The name is from an Old Turkic word meaning 'swampy place.'E.M. Pospelov, Geograficheskie nazvaniya mira (Moscow, 1998), p. 149. It was the birthplace of Pavel Florensky. == References == * *World Gazetteer: Azerbaijan - World-Gazetteer.com Category:Cities in Azerbaijan Category:Aran Economic Region
title: Yevlakh
